name: Find The Killer
description:
Description:

Use your observational skills to find a killer among a crowd of innocent characters. Any time the killer will touch an innocent, the innocent will disappear within 5-10 seconds. Be careful, because any contact with the killer will kill you instantly. Also, remember that the killer will change every time you play. Once you think you know who the killer is, click on their character to frame them. Guess the killer and you will win. However, any wrong guess will lose you the game.

(TIP: Whenever you hear the music stop, that means that someone has been killed)

Controls:
Arrow Keys to move
Click on a character to accuse them.
